metadata.dc:title: Untitled (Fortune Cookie)
metadata.dc:creator: Felix Gonzalez Torres
metadata.dc:subject: The subject of Félix González-Torres' artwork "Untitled (Fortune Cookie Corner)" is typically related to themes of consumerism, abundance, impermanence, and participation.
metadata.dc:description: Untitled (Fortune Cookie Corner) consists of a large pile of fortune cookies displayed in a corner of a room. The viewers are invited to take a cookie from the pile. The endless supply aspect of the artwork means that the pile of cookies is continuously replenished, creating an impression that the supply of cookies is never-ending
metadata.dc:rights: propriety of the Felix Gonzalez Torres Foundation
